title: How To Fall in Love | StreetSmart
description: In this Max Fosh video, he sets out to find love by asking strangers on the street for their advice on falling in love.
summary: Max Fosh asks random people on the street for their advice on how to fall in love.
payoff: The humorous twist comes from the diverse and often conflicting advice given by the strangers, showing the complexity and subjectivity of love.
